OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Permission.label: Permission level to join
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

StartPerm.label: Start Permission level
StartPerm.tooltip: Set the permission level to start the game

StartPermInfo.label: Start Permission level info
StartPermInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission to start

Payout.label: Payout
Payout.tooltip: How many points to give to the user who gets the secret word

Streamer.label: Streamer Name
Streamer.tooltip: Bot will whisper you the chosen emote. DO NOT KEEP EMPTY

BaseResponse.value: {0} has guessed the secret emote. The emote was {1}. {0} has won {2} {3}
BaseResponse.label: Success message
BaseResponse.tooltip:
{0} = user 
 {1} = winning emote 
 {2} = payout 
 {3} = currency name

Start.value: Bingo has started. Send emotes (one per message) and guess the emote.
Start.label: Start message
Start.tooltip: The message to appear when bingo starts
